name: Temple of Doom
description:
This game was created for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021 .

You have managed to seize the relic of the Temple of Doom, however now you must get out and it will not be an easy task, all kinds of traps and dangers await you.

The game consists of different rooms (5 in the current version) full of traps, the door of each room is closed and must be opened by means of a combination of glyphs, the objective is to overcome these rooms to reach the end.

Taking into account the theme of the jam, when you manage to open the door of a room you have 10 seconds to go through it before it closes again.

Use the keys W, S, A, D or the arrows to move.

Developed by:

Isra Maraver https://motionsorcery.itch.io/

and

Alecxs Sunders https://alecxs-sunders.itch.io/

Note: You may experience some sound bugs with certain browsers if you are playing the HTML version, we are working on fixing it, in the meantime you can opt for the downloadable version.

Mac and Linux versions were not tested.
